name: International Research Conference on Engineering and Technology
content: International Research Conference on Engineering and Technology, IRCET 2015, aims at bringing together the researchers, scientists, engineers, and scholar students in all areas of Engineering, Technology, Life Sciences, Natural Sciences and Applied Sciences. This is a wonderful chance to enhance interaction and communication for all scholars, also opportunity to warm up for further discussion of IRCET. Surrounding by exotic Bali beach with delegates from all over the world, IRCET will provide you a sensation with valuable academic experience. You shouldnâ€™t miss out.
